specifications.Finish: Decoration > Glitter Glitter treatment applies fine reflective particles onto the fabric using adhesive or print techniques, creating a sparkling effect. It adds a festive and glamorous look, making it suitable for party and special-occasion clothing.
specifications.Care Advice: Decoration > Glitter This fabric is delicate and susceptible to damage from rubbing or impact. Please handle it with care. Yarn Effect > Metallic Yarn Please be careful not to pull threads when using this fabric, due to its nature of this fabric.
specifications.Care Instructions: Dry clean only Recommended Use Partywear
